subject: ESCALATION: Pricing disagreement for Product X - need your decision

body.reason: Two rounds of debate without resolution. Both positions have merit.

positions.position: Price at $45 to match market and drive volume
positions.evidence: 3 of 5 competitors at $42-48 range. Volume play wins long-term.

positions.position: Price at $52 to maintain margin given our shipping costs
positions.evidence: Our shipping is $4-5 higher. $45 yields only 32% margin vs 40% target.

body.recommended_action: Consider $49 as middle ground, or decide based on Q1 priority (margin vs volume)
